title: By the Kynge and the Quene whereas dyuers bokes filled bothe with heresye, sedityon and treason, haue of late, and be dayly broughte into thys realme out of forreine countries ... and some also  couertly printed within this realme ...
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1553-1558 : Mary I)
publisher: In aedibus Iohannis Cavvodi Tipographi regi√¶  maiestatis,
notes: Other title information from first four lines of text.
For execution of persons found to possess heretical books.
"Geuen at our manor of Saynt Iameses the vi. day of Iune."
Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
